titleInfo.title: ‘Route from Isfahan by Kermanshah to Muraga and return by Hamadan. Performed under Orders of Brigr. Genl. Malcolm by Lieut. E. Frederick of the Bombay Military Establishmt. AD. 1810’

physicalDescription.extent: Materials:Pen and ink on paperDimensions:501 x 400 mm, on sheet 545 x 450 mm

mods.abstract: Distinctive Features:Relief shown by hachures.Routes indicated by dotted lines.Inscriptions:On the recto in the bottom right-hand corner signature ‘John Garstin Surveyor Genls. Office Fort William 1811’.Labels:On the recto in the lower centre black ink oval stamp ‘E.I. COMP’S LIBRARY’.
